snippet: President Hugo Chávez is fighting a severe lung infection that has led to a “respiratory deficiency,” the country’s information minister said Thursday.
abstract: Pres Hugo Chavez of Venezuela is fighting severe lung infection after surgery for cancer in Cuban hospital.
lead_paragraph: President Hugo Chávez is fighting a severe lung infection that has led to a “respiratory deficiency,” the country’s information minister said Thursday.

headline.seo: After Surgery, Chávez Is Fighting a Severe Lung Infection
headline.main: Venezuela: After Surgery, Chávez Is Fighting a Severe Lung Infection
headline.print_headline: Venezuela: After Surgery, Chávez Is Fighting a Severe Lung Infection
